item.description:
Club Passim fans are going to LOVE this music cruise around the harbor on a gorgeous  Sunday afternoon with Lori McKenna, one of my favourites, and Liz Longley, who sounds really amazing. Check them both out!

Buy your own ticket online ($27 in advance) for this fabulous concert on the Provincetown 11 out of South Boston (near the ICA) with Lori McKenna and comparative newcomer Liz Longley.

http://www.etix.com/ticket/online/performanceSearch.jsp?performance_id=1631776

NOTE: I charge a mere $1 per person for every Culture Vultures event you attend to help cover the monthly dues. Please offer me this when you see me - I don't really like to have to ask for it.

Lori McKenna with Liz Longley presented by Passim***21+
Rock and Blues Concert Cruises Aboard the Provincetown ll
August 26, 2012 3:00 PM
Door Open: 2:00 PM
Rock and Blues Concert Cruise
Bay State Cruise Company
Aboard the Provincetown II.
200 Seaport Blvd
Boston, MA 02110
Must be 21 or older
General Admission

Check out the musicians' websites.. the last music harbor cruise with Melissa Ferrick was really fabulous! You get a chance to cruise past some of the Harbor Islands too. Bring a hat and sunscreen and your camera.  There is a bar on the boat plus some very basic food. It's not a luxury liner, but it's a lot of fun.

Tickets $27 in advance, $33 on the day.

Go to http://lorimckenna.com/ for a taste of Lori's music. She's amazing!

THEN check out http://www.lizlongley.com/ - we are in for a TREAT!!
item.how_to_find_us: We'll assemble on the top deck - look out for Ange. Seats on top are very limited so arrive by 2. 30 - boat leaves at 3 pm.
item.name: Let's Harbor cruise with Lori McKenna and Liz Longley this Sunday afternoon!
